How to fix the Problem with the "Trial expired" warning:

1) Download the torrent
2) Unzip
3) Open Setup Folder and Camtasia
4) Replace it with your old one
5) Change your date to somwhere before you downloaded the trial
6) Follow the other Steps (crack the app etc.)

Hope this works for you!
